description: This file defines an Angular service named CategoriesService for managing categories via REST API. It includes methods to list, create, and remove categories and uses HTTP client injections and environment configurations.

classes.name: CategoriesService
classes.description: An Angular injectable service for managing category data via REST API; includes list, create, and remove methods.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches all categories from the API endpoint, returning an observable of Category array with error handling that returns an empty list on failure.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new category with a provided name and optional color; sends POST request and returns the created Category object.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a category identified by id by sending a DELETE request to the API endpoint.
